author: rvesse
msg: Fix a race condition that may occur when using InfModel in a multi-threaded environment, it was previously possible for multiple threads to try and call prepare() and hit ConcurrentModificationException's.

This fix modifies the code for the underlying InfGraph() to make calls to prepare() synchronized and to ensure threads always see the current prepared state.  This should resolve JENA-399, the previously failing tests are now enabled

author: hossman
msg: SOLR-4472: jdoc updates for DateField and UUIDField refering to TimestampUpdateProcessorFactory and UUIDUpdateProcessorFactory (merge r1448879)

author: hashutosh
msg: HIVE-4048 : Allow partition by/order by in partitioning spec in over clause and partition function (Ashutosh Chauhan)
